It might be the same item if this enhancement wasn't copied.

dc20rpg.chat.confirmTargetsTooltip:
Press if you want to confirm that the targets are valid
and that events for the targets can be triggered. Do not
refresh targets after pressing this button as some effects
may have been removed. It is adviced to press that
button AFTER you apply all damage/healing
